attributes.title: I LOVE TRUMP BUT NO💞
attributes.review: i love trump oh so much but this app took weeks to download. and when it finally finished downloading the app wouldn’t open up it glitches so much! i do not recommend!

attributes.title: Official Trump app
attributes.review: I download the Trump app and it was doing nonsense and doing bad stuff and it wasn’t doing and I rate this app 0/10 because this app is full of nonsense and stuff that don’t belong in the App Store

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: I was excited to download the app but it ended up wiping out all of my data and bricking my phone. I am typing this review on my Samsung smart fridge.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Absolutely disgusting quality. It glitches out my phone and snatched personal information. I’m so mad and I want to speak to the manager.

attributes.title: This app took all my money!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it charged me 240,00$ on my credit card only to tell me that i have to LEAVE the app unless i attend “in-person classes” ?? A SCAMM!! This app is a scam!!!

attributes.title: simply.. not great
attributes.review: If I had the option to choke on a small shrimp or use this app, I would go for the shrimp as it would be significantly more satisfactory than THIS APP THAT CRASHED MY PHONE, also my salivary glands naturally secret cocktail sauce so 🥰

attributes.title: Insulting
attributes.review: This app literally just compiled random words to form sentences. It was like using your keyboard to predict or talking to your grandpa with dementia. When it finally did form a coherent sentence, it called me a ANTIFA Terrorist and tried to grab me by the p*ssy. 🖕🖕🖕

attributes.title: WORST app ever.
attributes.review: Terrible app it takes forever to download and then it crashes and you can’t even load your phone.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Slow loading times, and froze my phone yesterday.

attributes.title: Horrible, disturbing and full of fake news
attributes.review: This app highlights the dumb side of the American society. It’s content is full of fake news, racist and politically incorrect content. I demand this app to be deleted!
